All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Battleship
    This class represents the battleships.
    Carrier
    This class represents the carriers.
    ClientProtocol
    Interface that must be implemented by a class that communicates with the server.
    ComputerPlayer
    This class represents the computer player in a singleplayer game.
    Destroyer
    This class represents the destroyers.
    Game
    This game represents a game for singleplayer.
    GameClient
    This class represents the communication with the server.
    GameConstants
    This class contains commonly used values from the game.
    HumanPlayer
    This class represents the human player in a singplayer game.
    Move
    This classes is used by the game client to continuously ask for user input for a move.
    Move
    This move class is extremely similar to the one for GameClient with just minor differences and the fact that it is used for singleplayer instead of multiplayer like the other move class..
    Patrol
    This class represents the patrols.
    Player
    The player interface allows to create different types of players that can participate in a single player game.
    ProtocolException
    Exception thrown when recieving a message from the server did not follow the defined protocol.
    ProtocolMessages
    Contains the strings that represent messages in the protocol.
    ServerUnavailableException
    Exception thrown when the reading or writing to server couldn't be done due to some IO error.
    Ship
    The interface for creating the various ship types.
    SocketCreationException
    Exception that is thrown in the case that a socket connection to the server couldn't be established.
    SuperPatrol
    This class represents the super patrols.
